back: Eyewash, ventilation, fire protection, spill neutralizer; no ignition sources.
Park, brake, power OFF, plug in per SOP; check cables and connectors.
Close valve, engine OFF, cool, disconnect carefully, leak check after install.
Forks down, neutral, brake set, power OFF; chock if required.
Inspect, report defects, connect charger/fuel per policy, secure truck.
Keep operator name, training & evaluation dates, evaluator identity; refreshers per triggers.
After incidents/near-misses, unsafe operation, workplace/equipment changes, or 3-year eval shows need.
No smoking or open flames; keep vent caps in place; handle electrolytes with PPE.
